channel.title: Homes on Vladimir Izmalkov
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Vladimir Izmalkov

item.description: Experienced Technical Writer & Documentation Engineer Over 15 years in IT: software developer, researcher, research manager, IT manager, Head of IT department, and technical writer. I specialize in developer-oriented technical documentation for sophisticated products and services: cloud platforms, XaaS, DBMS, etc. Software engineer experience First-hand developer experience. Excellent understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC), tools (Git, IDEs), and agile methodology. I prefer working with lightweight markup languages, static site generators, and docs-as-code approach.
